food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine.
👍 You can peel me easily with your hands.

food.question: I am red and round, and grow on a tree. Sometimes I'm in your lunchbox. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make pie with me.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?
I am white and you can drink me. Cows give me to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often served with cookies.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You can eat me for dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
👪 I often come in a group inside a shell.

food.question: I am a grain you eat with a spoon. I can be hot or cold. Goldilocks liked mine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I am often eaten for breakfast.
🐻 Goldilocks tasted three bowls of me.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am sweet and brown. Bees make me. You can put me in your tea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees make me in a hive.
🍵 I make your tea taste sweeter.

food.question: I am made from potatoes and often served with burgers. I'm long and crispy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a popular side dish.
🧂 People often put salt on me.

food.question: I'm a fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🟤 My skin is brown and hairy.

food.question: I am a white vegetable that smells strong and makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am a type of bulb.
😭 I can make you cry when you chop me up.
🍲 I am used to flavour many dishes.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and say 'glub, glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins and a tail.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and have lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the beach. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze into small spaces.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?
I am small and colorful, and live in a shell that I carry around. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that lives in the ocean and loves to jump and play. What am I?

hints.text: 💙 I am usually grey or blue.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal, I sing songs, and I have a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal in the world.
🎶 My songs can travel for miles.
💨 I breathe air through a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I am a star-shaped creature that lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 Sometimes I am found near coral reefs.

ocean.question: I float in the ocean, and sometimes sting people. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Some people think I look like jelly.
